lore: For a long time, Omnia was the most prosperous and beautiful city in the world. A marvelous sight, which colors and architecture were beyond imagination. High silver and glass towers, streets that ran at various heights, lights that floated at night. From one day to another, it became a hotbed of Ghouls and Forsaken, burnt and in ruins.\n\nWhen a Rapturous Ghoul bites a victim, he does so while running, taking advantage of his speed to tear off more tissue.
menagerieDialog: (You can't help but wonder how this creature came to become so damn ugly.)
(It eyes your other creatures hungrily. Better get it a steak before you're left without a team.)
name: Rapturous Ghoul
